description: Admin Dashboard is a responsive web application template built with React and Tailwind CSS. It provides a clean and modern design for managing administrative tasks and data visualization.
title: Admin Dashboard
long_description: This project is an Admin Dashboard built with React and TailwindCSS, designed to provide a comprehensive interface for managing administrative tasks. It features a responsive layout, data visualization components, user management, analytics, and various widgets for quick access to important information. The dashboard is suitable for applications in various domains such as e-commerce, healthcare, and education, providing a user-friendly experience with modern UI/UX principles.
author: Ahmed Hussien

description: Fresh Cart is a modern and responsive e-commerce website template built with React and Tailwind CSS. It features a clean and elegant design for showcasing various products and shopping-related content.
title: Fresh Cart E-commerce
long_description: Fresh Cart is a comprehensive e-commerce solution built with React and TailwindCSS. The project features product catalogs, shopping cart functionality, user authentication, payment integration, and responsive design. It's designed to provide a seamless shopping experience with modern UI/UX patterns and optimized performance for both desktop and mobile devices.
author: Ahmed Hussien

description: Ethan Portfolio Template is a modern and responsive portfolio template built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS and farmer motion. It showcases a clean and elegant design for presenting personal projects and skills.
title: Ethan Portfolio Template
long_description: Ethan Portfolio Template is a sophisticated portfolio website built with Next.js and enhanced with Framer Motion animations. The template features smooth transitions, interactive elements, project showcases, skills sections, and contact forms. It's optimized for SEO and performance with Next.js features like SSR and image optimization.
author: Ahmed Hussien

description: A web-based code editor that mimics the look and feel of Visual Studio Code. It is built using React + TypeScript + Vite and Tailwind CSS, providing a modern and responsive design for coding tasks.
title: VS Code Clone
long_description: This VS Code Clone replicates the core functionality and appearance of Visual Studio Code in a web browser. Built with React, TypeScript, and Vite, it features syntax highlighting, file management, multiple tabs, theme switching, and a responsive layout. The project demonstrates advanced React patterns and TypeScript integration for building complex web applications.
author: Ahmed Hussien

description: A collection of frontend projects built using React, showcasing various design patterns and UI components. Each project is designed to be responsive and user-friendly. with 3 Mode Dark, Light and Blue mode.
title: Frontend Mentor Projects
long_description: This collection showcases multiple Frontend Mentor challenges solved using React. Each project demonstrates different aspects of frontend development including responsive design, state management, API integration, and modern CSS techniques. The collection features dark, light, and blue themes, providing users with customizable viewing experiences.
author: Ahmed Hussien

description: Jack Portfolio Template is a modern and responsive portfolio template built with HTML, CSS and Custom Js. It showcases a clean and elegant design for presenting personal projects and skills.

description: Github-User-Search is a web application that allows users to search for GitHub users and view their profiles, repositories, and other information. It is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, providing a clean and user-friendly interface.
title: Github User Search
long_description: Github User Search is a web application that integrates with the GitHub API to provide comprehensive user search functionality. Users can search for GitHub profiles, view repositories, followers, following, and detailed statistics. The application features responsive design, error handling, and real-time data fetching for an optimal user experience.
author: Ahmed Hussien
